column5: We have a cozy 4 bed/ 2 1/2 bath home with two living areas, fireplace. Guests can have breakfast and a cup of coffee in the kitchen if they wish. There is an upstairs laundry area they may wish to use while they are here. Great for singles or a couple that want to explore all the Austin area has to offer for less than the price of a hotel!
column8: Cozy, comfortable, warm home in north Austin.
